No it's not. Save file location is changed. You need to move it to other location (don't know where, sorry). Also - you can disable CloudSaving in config.ini if that don't help

Save is now stored in the cloud, but it can be disabled. Go to the address C:  Users  * username *  Documents  Klei  DoNotStarve and open settings.ini, and in line DISABLECLOUD change false to true.
     If you need to get save from previous versions of the game, they are located at C:  Users  * username *  AppData  Local  FLT  Steam  211670  remote

I can't vhose between characters, saveslots, and the game son't save the game. every time I click on the play button, it genereates a new world. Is it just me, or someone else have the same problem? And how can I fix this?

guys, dont panic, nothing wrong there... you just need to copy files from 

C:UsersUSERNAMEAppDataLocalFLTSteam211670remote

and paste it in

C:UsersUSERNAMEDocumentsKleiDoNotStarvesave

then you can continue from your previous save game

NEW VERSIONS:

Full game: http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8256976/Don_t_Starve_Beta_14_Mar_2013_HOTFIX

Hotfix only: http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8257087/Don_t_Starve_Beta_14_Mar_2013_HOTFIX_ONLY

To make backup file:

1. LibrariesDocumentsKleiDoNotStarve

2. Open up the file settings with notepad etc.

3. Change DISABLECLOUD = false to DISABLECOULD = true.

4. Open your saved game

5. Save and quit

6. Go to LibrariesDocumentsKleiDoNotStarvesaves

7. There's your saves!
